entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Wasm][Test Failure] ConsolePublishAndRun(config: "Release", aot: True, relinking: False) #106162
  • [Wasm][Test Failure] LoadLazyAssemblyBeforeItIsNeeded(lazyLoadingTestExtension: "wasm", allLazyLoadingTestExtensions: ["wasm", "dll", "NoExtension"]) #106160
  • TcpClient not working with maui when there is multiple connection #106149
  • [DAC][ReJIT] ReJitManager::IsReJITEnabled checked DOTNET_ProfAPI_RejitOnAttach in the wrong environment #106148
  • Add `IAlternateEqualityComparer<ReadOnlySpan<byte>, string>` support to `StringComparer` #106147
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'compIsaSupportedDebugOnly(InstructionSet_SSE41)' #106143
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Bad codegen with `Avx512F.VL.RotateLeftVariable` and `Avx512F.VL.RotateRightVariable` on win-x86 #106142
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '(m_result->gtDebugFlags & GTF_DEBUG_NODE_MORPHED) == (node->gtDebugFlags & GTF_DEBUG_NODE_MORPHED)' during 'Morph - Global' #106141
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '(ssize_t)emitCurStackLvl >= argSize' #106140
    9.0.0
  • iOS, .NET 9 Preview 7, AOT compiler failure #106137
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: `TextWriter.WriteLineAsync` with `CancellationToken` overloads #106136
    Future
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Internal.HostTests.StartCanBeCancelled test failure #106135
  • tailcall_v4/hijacking/hijacking.cmd Timed Out #106134
  • JIT SVE: Assertion failed ''targetReg != embMaskOp1Reg'' during 'Generate code' #106124
  • Compile-time logging source generation does only concat first collection of strings in message #106122
    10.0.0
  • Support ReadOnlySequence<char> as AlternateLookup #106121
    Future
  • JIT-generated code run time varies wildly #106117
  • CreateCounter can create corruptable counter #106115
  • Test failure: tracing/eventpipe/eventsourceerror/eventsourceerror/eventsourceerror.cmd #106113
  • Unnecessary outer loop in CountBy #106110
    Future
  • Process silently exits after patching self-contained app with Debug bits when specific breakpoints are set #106104
    10.0.0

Closed

  • [mono][wasm] Assertion at mono/utils/lock-free-alloc.c:210, condition `!desc->in_use' not met #106007
    9.0.0
  • Initializing RuntimeMetrics #105845
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'OperIs(GT_LCL_VAR, GT_LCL_FLD, GT_PHI_ARG, GT_STORE_LCL_VAR, GT_STORE_LCL_FLD, GT_LCL_ADDR)' during 'Assertion prop' #105670
    9.0.0
  • Debugger hits SIGSEGV in ShimStackWalk::StackWalkInfo::GetCurrentInternalFrame when .NET app throws exception #105374
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'isContainable || supportsRegOptional' during 'Generate code' #105467
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'OperIs(GT_LCL_VAR, GT_LCL_FLD, GT_PHI_ARG, GT_STORE_LCL_VAR, GT_STORE_LCL_FLD, GT_LCL_ADDR)' #95078
    9.0.0
  • Investigate what would be required to move some SIMD functionality out of the JIT and into managed code #102275
    Future
  • Look at method alignment with OptimizationPreference=Size and ControlFlowGuard=Guard #105326
    9.0.0
  • Conversion from UTC to EET depends on system time zone when it shouldn't #106120
  • AssignmentPatterns can break with two out parameters from the same method #85464
    9.0.0
  • MonoAOT producing invalid ARM assembly for generic specialization heavy code .NET 6/7 Android #89369
    9.0.0
  • [Perf -55%] PerfLabTests.StackWalk.Walk #39115
    Future
  • Configuration Binding Generator does not correctly handle required fields in child objects. #101984
    9.0.0
  • Regex internal static cache: new regex instances are treated as 'oldest' ones and removed after cache is full (LRU may not work) #105748
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: Loader/classloader/StaticVirtualMethods/GenericContext/GenericContextTestDefaultImp/GenericContextTestDefaultImp/GenericContextTestDefaultImp.cmd #106106
  • JIT SVE: Assertion failed 'isVectorRegister(reg4)' during 'Generate code' #105719
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '(imm < maxVal) || ((imm & signBitsMask) == signBitsMask)' during 'Generate code' #106020
    9.0.0
  • Arm64/Sve: Missing test coverage for invalid immediate #104809
    9.0.0
  • Dependency injection: FromKeyedServiceAttribute falls back to last defined unkeyed service of the type -- unexpected behavior? #102654
    9.0.0
  • DefineUninitializedData on TypeBuilder in System.Reflection.Emit uses typeof(ValueType) internally even when using a MetadataLoadContext #105772
    9.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Update nollvm methods to init themselves in its prolog #83377
    9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] How to compile linux-musl-arm64 shared libraries on Ubuntu( x64) #106029
    Future
  • Test failure: System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.JsonElementTests.DeepEquals_TooDeepJsonDocument_ThrowsInsufficientExecutionStackException #105532
    9.0.0
  • Object cloning does not work in maui #106077
  • `TimeOnlyConverter` should tolerate more formats in line with `TimeSpanConverter`. #105892
    9.0.0
  • [WASI] make Task/Pollable registration weak ref #105810
    9.0.0
  • The RuntimeIdentifier platform 'browser-wasm' and the PlatformTarget 'x64' must be compatible #97515
    9.0.0
  • `BrotliCompress` task uses only timestamp to decide which files to skip #72938
    9.0.0
  • Port System.Diagnostics docs for .NET 9 APIs #105980
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Potential bad codegen with `Avx2.PermuteVar8x32` #105824
    9.0.0
  • Runtime crashing under WSL2 on Volterra #106081
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure that aggregation is consistent regardless of data alignment #106166
    area-System.Numerics
  • Mitigate Crossgen2 Failures in Outerloop CI #106165
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] Synthesize a valid ECMA-335 image for read/write metadata instead of providing a separate metadata reader #106164
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Delete superfluous CanGetUnflushedBytes check in Serialize #106163
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Only run AVX512 tests on CPUs that support it (Windows) #106161
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix config binding with records having collection constructor parameter #106158
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • Fix NativeAOT runtime build without FEATURE_EVENT_TRACE #106157
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [EventPipe] Block eventpipe delete provider for pending callbacks #106156
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Fix C5271 warning in IJW tests #106153
    test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure
  • [No merge] Reproing an assert in outerloop #106152
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement support for BEGIN/END_ILLINK_FEATURE_SWITCH in CoreLib/EE interface validation #106151
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [wasm] Use the right env variable in mono.proj for frozen cache #106150
    area-Build-mono
  • Make Config generator test only for down-casts #106145
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: add test coverage for *Faulting* cases to make sure inactive lanes are zeroed out (#105580) #106139
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable Sve.CreateBreakPropagateMask() to take both operands as zero #106130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ARM64-SVE: Ensure MOVPRFX is next to SVE instruction in imm tables #106125
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Disable robust mutexes in PAL on Qemu #106123
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] System.Console CancelKeyPressTests.ExitDetectionNotBlockedByHandler increase timeout #106119
    area-System.Console, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix some NRT on StringCollection #106116
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Removes the outer loop for CountBy #106111
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Fix Enum.ToObject(Type, object) for nint/nuint #106109
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime, 10.0.0
  • Skip putting patches in certain stubs to prevent crashing on step-in on M1 with JMC disabled #106105
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Cache the path on `Module` for easier diagnostics #106103
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • [wasm] Be more cautious about page zeroing #106080
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono
  • EventSource startup initialization #106014
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 9.0.0
  • JIT: fix assert in assertion prop #106146
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Enable TLS on linux/arm64 only for static resolver #106101
    Servicing-approved, Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixed a broken build with STRESS_DYNAMIC_HEAP_COUNT enabled #105507
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add package readme to framework packages #106097
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Fix Sve.StoreNarrow() tests #106126
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Backport https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/pull/100528 to release/8.0 to fix Perf runs. #106049
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix TimeZone Names #106056
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.9
  • JIT: Fix `genHWIntrinsic_R_R_RM_I` assertion handling when ins is `INS_insertps` #106100
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Remove Ubuntu Crossgen from perf tests #106159
    area-Infrastructure
  • Detect avx512 in test infra to cover more platforms #105907
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add a thread pool config var on Windows for choosing the number of IOCPs #105145
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Allow data dehydration even if CFG is enabled #106133
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Align methods at 16-byte boundaries for CFG #106132
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix `Int128` checked-convert to signed IntX #105998
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics, 8.0.9
  • Fix trim analysis for assignment to multiple refs in single method call #105663
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [NRBF] List all exceptions that can be thrown by the decoder #106138
    binary-serialization, area-System.Formats.Nrbf, 9.0.0
  • Assign latest virtual timestamp for added node to enable LRU manner of RegexCache #105746
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Make {Try}GetAlternateLookup methods for Dictionary/HashSet instance instead of extensions #106107
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Avoid containing non-embedded conditional select #105719 #105812
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.LoadVector*FirstFaulting APIs #104964
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Remove `GT_CAST` handling in `Lowering::IsValidConstForMovImm` #106092
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: add missing test coverage for invalid immediate (#104809) #105677
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Add space in shared lib entrypoint option #106073
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][x64] Disable EmptyStructs tests on System V #106112
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix some core typeof(...) references #105903
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [browser] Fix AOT targeting .NET 6 #105805
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Revert "Use ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull in more places (#105380)" #106108
    area-System.Collections, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] disable test HttpClient_CancelInDifferentThread #106114
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Run Antigen/Fuzzlyn on Sat/Sun #106118
    needs-area-label
  • Increment nested depth in TooDeepJsonDocument test by 10x #105836
    area-System.Text.Json
  • TimeOnlyConverter should tolerate more formats in line with TimeSpanConverter #106053
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [WASI] timers based on wasi:clocks #105879
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • Fix input size flag on `vpermd`. #106054
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • [RISC-V] Fix Reg Order for Float Registers #105930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2511706 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Run native aot runtime tests on cet compatible machines #105288
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add WebSocket Keep-Alive Ping and Timeout (minimal) implementation #105841
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Inject IJW Copy Constructor calls in the JIT instead of in the IL stubs #106000
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for Add Sve.GatherVectorUInt*ZeroExtendFirstFaulting() #105030
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Convert.FromHexString exception with too large buffer #105426
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #106045
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Obsolete ExchangeAlgorithmType, CipherAlgorithmType and HashAlgorithmType and their usage #105875
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Security, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • [Mono AOT] Fix error when returning zero sized struct #106013
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Consume the existing instruction metadata when validating expected memory size #106090
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64/Sve: DelayfreeUses for FMLA should take into account CndSel for RMW #105541
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Emit Align8 flag for thread statics #105931
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Consider methods returning constants same as substitutions #105878
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • MemoryCache - Remove unhandled exception handler #105853
    area-System.Runtime.Caching, 9.0.0
  • [CG] Bump Microsoft.IO.Redist to 6.0.1 #106102
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Expose StressLog via CDAC and port StressLogAnalyzer to managed code #104999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Add some basic guidelines around using C++ standard headers now that our build allows us to #101088
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Ensure we consistently broadcast the result of simd dot product #106031
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Added AsReadOnly() extension to ISet<T> #106037
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add Ubuntu 24.04 Helix Images to pipeline #106048
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Refactor memory copies in `SafeBuffer` #105206
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • ActivatorUtilities: Do not wrap Delegate.Invoke in another delegate #105814
    NO-MERGE, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] Pass FP struct fields at arbitrary offsets in ArgIterator and CallDescrWorker #105800
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Add memory barriers to native AOT asm helpers #106004
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Test llvm bump #105867
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Bump to updated llvm 19 #105427
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [browser] Remove check for user agent when attaching debugger #105559
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix opt value for an embedded intrinsic in ConditionalSelect (#105720) #105803
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ARM64-SVE: Fix conditional select for Zeroing predicates #102904 #105737
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve, 9.0.0
  • Rewrite GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte #104503
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Added a fix for an incorrect assumption of an assertion failure re: failure to decommit. #105849
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [iOS][HybridGlobalization] Handle small buffer case in sortkey #106062
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • fix infinite loop in foregroundgc test #106006
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • STJ-SG: tolerate ref struct members with JsonIgnore. #106083
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Remove BinaryReader and BinaryWriter references from ZipArchive #103153
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 10.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Re-enable the `SharedLibrary` test for WASI P2 #2648

PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Merge to August 6 #2647
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] add support for building WASI and browser debug & release on Linux #2605
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `build.cmd` should have a flag like `-s` or `--sdk-only` to skip installer build #42627
  • dotnet-watch: Investigate CI test failure: RuntimeProcessLauncherTests.UpdateAppliedToNewProcesses #42612

Closed

  • Don't reference Microsoft.Windows.SDK.NET.Ref for C++/CLI projects #42599

PullRequests

Created

  • Download rsync if using mariner #42628
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump branding for 401 hotfix #42624
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #42621
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Add regression test for TrimmerSingleWarn with PublishAot #42583
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Plan for addressing torn SDK builds #41790
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #42567
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #42610
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #42601
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reenable test in GivenThatWeWantToRunILLink.cs #42580
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • [main] Enable the roslyn framework package only on C# and VB #42605
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [8.0.1xx] No .deps.json for net472 Container task #42317
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Containers, Branch Lockdown, 8.0.9
  • Enable Windows.UI.Xaml profile for Windows SDK projections #41936
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Partner request
  • fix bug in workload history recorder #42536
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • ResolvePackageReferences: PackageDependenciesDesignTime inherits transitive package DiagnosticLevel #42546
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement support for multi-process Hot Reload #41324
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update the version of System.Formats.Asn1 #42278
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Update the version of System.Formats.Asn1 #42277
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2511429 #42570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-08
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Proposal: Fast, Efficient Unions #7016

Updated

  • Proposal: `field` keyword in properties #140
    Working Set
  • Champion "Discriminated Unions" #113
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Specify nullability analysis of field-backed properties #8346

Merged

  • Notes for field WG meeting 2024-08-07 #8345
  • Polish and clarify prior field WG notes #8342

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Generator vs xaml generated files (the "*.g.i.cs") #74685
  • Synthesized collection types may result in empty unnecessary `<PrivateImplementationDetails>` class #74684
  • The [InterceptsLocation] attribute generates a different "data" string for big-endian platforms #74682
  • False positive IDE0001 when using extern alias #74681

Closed

  • Collection Expression Generated Types miss the [CompilerGenerated] attribute #74676
    17.12
  • Class <>z__ReadOnlyArray<T> generated for literal collections is not tagged with CompilerGeneratedAttribute #72539
    Backlog
  • Missing nullability warning for spreads of maybe-null collections #74667
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35207.120 #74680

PullRequests

Created

  • Rewrite BulidSolution in Integration tests #74690
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove most usage of "new ArrayBuilder" #74689
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix `NETCOREAPP3_0_OR_GREATER` in `SegmentedArrayHelper` #74687
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: nullable analysis of spread element expression #74686
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Only report project load events for initial load in VSCode #74688
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Remove razor source generator hack #74651
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Mark compiler-generated list type with `[CompilerGenerated]` attribute #74683
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations in AbstractSymbolCompletionProvider.CreateItems #74670
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Update Microsoft.VisualStudio.Debugger.Contracts to 17.12.0-beta.24403.1 #74678
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Fix CG issue for Microsoft.IO.Redist #74653
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Issue71522 wip #74691
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add option for LSP based auto-insert #74485
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update LSP Protocol Types #73911
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Do not mark 2 first `int` parameters of an interpolated string handler constructor as unused #74064
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add span type inference #74646
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Use single argument overload for `[start..]` of `string` or `(ReadOnly)Span` #74643
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix null encoding in new document in move type action #74623
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Handle various cases for field-backed properties #74641
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unexpected behavior in HttpLoggingMiddleware #57242
  • GroupName is applied to all endpoints when it shouldn't be. #57241
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #57240
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #57239
  • Placing Interactive Content Inside SectionContent component disables its interactive event handlers #57238
  • Sites using ShadowCopy fail with 500 errors when Maximum Worker Processes > 1 #57235
  • Collections of non-nullable types are not checked for null in ASP.NET Core APIs #57234
  • CancellationTokenSource potential leaks in SignalR HubConnection #57232
  • [9.0.100-rc.1.24406.1] EasyCMS app launch failed with 'Multiple constructors accepting all given argument types have been found in type 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.CookiePolicy.CookiePolicyMiddleware' exception #57231
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudUpdateProduct #57229
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #57227
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, json_middleware, plaintext #57226
  • Ability to know why the antiforgery token validation has failed and then return custom responses #57225
    Backlog

Closed

  • Trailing comma in launchSettings.json breaks `dotnet watch` #57214
  • [9.0-preview7] OpenAPI schemas are not stable between generations #56990
    9.0-rc1
  • Perf regression: fortunes #57228
  • [WebToolsE2E] Run .exe/.dll file with error "An exception occurred while trying to decrypt the element." from publish folder after publishing .NET 9.0 Razor/MVC/Blazor web app project. #57137
  • [Blazor] JS initializers declared in RCLs run twice #57087
    9.0-rc1
  • Blazor enhanced navigation "before" javascript event #53887
    9.0-rc1
  • Consuming scoped service from App.razor #57233
  • FocusOnNavigate does not work (dotnet8 - BlazorWebApp) #52412
    .NET 10 Planning
  • runtime and efcore dependency out of date #57179
  • Perf improvement: json #57205

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] Fix antiforgery not being available after first render #57237
    area-blazor
  • Use System.Threading.Lock in Kestrel #57236
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Middleware/Rewrite: Update XML comments for "AddRedirect" to indicate status code. #57224
    community-contribution, area-networking, area-middleware

Merged

  • Update azure-pipelines-mirror-within-azdo.yml for 8.0 #56457
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.9
  • [CG[ Update ws dep in release/8.0 #56677

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Flickering Issue When Toggling WebView Visibility in Grid Layout on Android #24113
  • Switch control not shows thumb color properly in the Windows when initially its state is off. #24107
  • [iOS] CarouselView doesn't scroll to the right Position after changing the ItemSource with Loop enabled #24105
    9.0-rc1
  • iOS animated border #24104
  • [Windows] MauiWinUIWindow leak #24102
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Initial value for the SearchHandler background color ignored on page first appearance #24100
  • [Windows] MediaPicker.CapturePhotoAsync not working (msix installed) #24098
  • How to activate Hyper-v, in my windows feature it is not found #24097
  • Remove the bit that removes xcsync #24094
    9.0-rc1
  • Exception While setting style in MAUI: The given key 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.SetterSpecificity' was not present in the dictionary. #24093
  • Theming android native timepicker popup #24092
  • Changing the MainPage resets the ModalStack of Navigation without popping the pages #24090
  • Multi-project template, lack of loaded projects after creation #24089
  • AOT+Trimming crashes app on some Android devices #24088

Closed

  • ios test flight crash #24011
  • MAUI App crash at startup in net9.0.100-preview.6.24328.19 #24025

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix cake scripts to work locally #24111
  • 2174059 MAUI hit testing ignores pages loaded by PushModalAsync #24109
  • [ci] Simplify shipping drop metadata names #24103
    area-infrastructure
  • Add shared project for multi-project template when generated in Visual Studio #24095
    area-templates

Merged

  • Merge things from `release/9.0.1xx-preview7` into `net9.0` #24070

Updated

  • [Android] Fix incorrect height of CollectionView when ItemsSource is empty. #24067
    community ✨, .NET 8 SR9
  • [iOS] Shell toolbar items #20510
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Bump to RC.1 #23967
    9.0-rc1
  • Build the previous TFMs #23896
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview7
  • [Windows][GestureManager] Unsubscribe control tap events only if they were subscribed #23976
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, t/perf
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • HybridWebView: Invoke JS methods from .NET #23769
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • [Android] Space character in Webview's Source #24002
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-webview
  • [Testing] Added UITest to validate the Switch OnColor property #20542
    area-testing, area-controls-switch, testing-flakiness
  • Add support for iOS/Mac specific modals styled as popovers #23984
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Added a support for the device's theme change #22508
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix for Entry SelectionLength #24064
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix Span Foreground property #24063
    community ✨, .NET 8 SR9
  • [Android] Fix ToolbarItem font color issue after changing available state. #24065
    community ✨, .NET 8 SR9
  • Fix Shell.NavBarIsVisible property #20173
    area-xaml, area-controls-shell
  • Fixed low quality images in Resizetizer #23924
    area-single-project, community ✨
  • Introduce WindowProvider and add to Scoped ServiceProvider #24081
  • NavigationBar properties not updating - fix #23076
    area-navigation, community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Why is EF Core adding shadow fields on many to many join table queries? #34389
  • EF integration for generating embeddings for database vector data #34387
    Backlog
  • Owned entity with ForeignKey throws exception from ModelSnapshot when applying migration #34386
  • Get latest version of all from temporal table, with include. #34384

Closed

  • "Index was out of range" in ShaperProcessingExpressionVisitor.JsonEntityMaterializerRewriter #32431
    9.0.0
  • wrong generated query #33839
    9.0.0
  • how to invoke multiple call for onmodelcreating in dbcontext #34207
  • How can i easily configure the value comparison of the change-tracker to be value-equality instead of reference-equality? #34248
  • Bug in EF Core causing unexpected MERGE statements on unrelated tables. #34259
  • AutoInclude property of owned entities #34292
  • EF Core's Cascade Delete not deleting all associated records #34291
  • NRE thrown from SplitQueryingEnumerable.Enumerator.Dispose() when there is a connection error #33357
  • HasDefaultValueSql is ignored in GenerateCreateScript call for cross-schema table relations #33309
  • Store all enums as string even if they are defined as nullable - MongoDB #34382
  • Add-Migration in Package Manager Console never completes, breaking package manager until VS2022 exit #34055
  • Invalid SQL generated in Table-per-hierarchy with discriminator configuration #33486
  • Issue occurs when trying to generate query string when mapping entity with json to a view with a custom schema #34211
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Find the discriminator property even if it is not string #34388
    Servicing-consider
  • Split UseSqlServer/UseAzureSql/UseAzureSynapse builders #34385

Merged

  • Apply primary constructor cleanup everywhere #34377
  • Increase Linux CI timeout to accomodate additional Cosmos testing. #34380
  • Switch EntityFrameworkMetricsData.Get* methods to internal. These are consumed only by EF. #34379
  • Fix to #34211 - Issue occurs when trying to generate query string when mapping entity with json to a view with a custom schema #34239
  • fixing cosmos baselines to expect '$type' as the default discriminator name #34383

Updated

  • Optimize away DISTINCT inside IN/EXISTS/set operations #34381
  • New EF.Constant handling #34297
